short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Angry Birds Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Angry Birds background. Custom Fall Angry Birds background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy Angry Birds HD and 4K wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
Welcome to the amazing world of Angry Birds each time you open your new tab. This highly recommended extension delivers many of high resolution and 4K background images to your new tab in addition to some very useful tools.

FEATURES:
•	Whenever you open a new tab, the Angry Birds wallpaper is shuffled.
•	Google search provides speedy access to popular websites.
•	Easy access to email and social media accounts.
•	Quick access to your most often visited websites.
•	Bookmarks are easily accessible.
•	Modest Social Media Sharing.
•	Display Weather, Count down, Greetings, Time on screen.
•	Add a website to the Shortcuts tab for easy access.
•	User can change the settings by clicking on setting button.
